titleStmt.title: Digital description of MS. Heb. d. 65

physDesc.p: Oriental Rabb. and curs. char. (by various hands); vellum, mostly fragments, of various shapes and sizes.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on Catalogue of the Hebrew Manuscripts in the Bodleian Library, vol. ii, by Adolf Neubauer and Arthur Ernest Cowley, Oxford 1906, No. 2877.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card (for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Admissions). Contact oriental@bodleian.ox.ac.uk for further information on the availability of this manuscript

msItem.title: Fragment of a כתובה
msItem.note: dated Nisan, 1380 Sel. = 1069 A.D., at ק]אהרה] near Fostat. Names missing. Verso blank.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

note.p: beg. missing, arranging for the charge of his property during the owner's absence on a journey. The deed was handed to משה בר אלחנן נ̇ע̇.
Witnesses, אברהם בר ישועה ס̇ט̇, אברהם ברבי שמעיה החבר נ̇ב̇ת̇ו̇י̇א̇, יחזקאל הכהן החבר ביר̇ עלי הכהן החבר בס̇ ג̇ד נ̇ע̇ (cf. No. 2875, 4, b), [ש]למה הכהן בן יוסף הכהן בן שלמה נ̇ע̇, פינחס בירבי לוי נ̇ע̇.
Below is a note, incomplete and obliterated.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a quittance
msItem.note: names missing. Dated Adar i, 1... Sel., at Fostat. Verso blank.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Letter of consolation
msItem.note: Letter of consolation to ר̇ אפרים החבר בס̇ גד̇ בר̇ מר̇ שמריה ז̇צ̇ל̇ from (?) אברהם המזרי, dated in the middle of Ab, [1]346 Sel. = 1035 A.D. The Nagid was then at Mahdieh. Verso, address only.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Business letter, in Arabic
msItem.note: from יוסף בן יעקוב טראבלסי to [אבו אל]פרג יוסף בן יעקוב בן [עוכל] ... and הלאל בן יוסף בן עוכל. Verso, address only.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

note.p: from משה החזן הזקן to מר̇ור̇ ר̇ שלה.
Verso, only the address to ר̇ ומ̇ שילא החמישי ... ראש לכ... from ... [הח]זן ברבי טוביה.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: כתובה
msItem.note: dated the 14th of Ḥeshwan, 1849 Sel. = 1538 A.D., at Fostat. The man's name is שלמה (?). Verso blank.

physDesc.p: Oriental char.; vellum, much injured and obliterated.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

note.p: The parties are ... יוסף בר כ̇ג̇ק̇ מר̇ור̇ יהודה and עיאל ברת מר̇ור̇ שלה הלוי הרופא בר ... אברהם הלוי נ̇ע̇. Verso blank.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

note.p: from יוסף ונסים בני ברכיה נ̇נ̇ to אבו אלפרג יוסף בן יעקב בן עוכל נ̇נ̇ (cf. no. 5) of مصر.
The נגיד הגולה is often mentioned. Verso, address only.

physDesc.p: Oriental char.; vellum, injured and obliterated.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

note.p: to אבו אלפרג יוסף בן יעקב בן עוכל נ̇נ̇ of مصر. (cf. no. 9), from נסים ביר̇ יוסף ז̇ק̇ל̇.
The writer says וקד עלם אללה יא סידי מא עלי קלבי ומא אנא פיה מן וצול כתב פי וקתא הדא מן ענד סידנא האיי נט̇ רח̇ מע אלפיוג תאריכהא ו שהור מן בגדאד ווצל אגודה̈ מסאיל כתבהא ג̇ירנא ....
He mentions אבו נצר צדקה אלשאמי and אבו עמראן מוסי בן יחיי אלמגאני.
The latter part is about a letter of exchange and other business.
Verso, the address, and, roughly written in Arabic characters, the date of receipt, Rebiʿ ii, 610 (A.H.? = 1213 A.D.).

physDesc.p: Oriental char.; vellum, injured and stained.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a כתובה
msItem.note: No date or names legible. Verso blank.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Deed
msItem.note: injured and obliterated. Verso blank.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

note.p: Deed, in Arabic, dated Tebeth, 4957 A.M. = 1197 A.D., at No Amon, of sale of a house in the outskirts of Alexandria by עאליה ... to מ̇ ישועה בר מ̇ר̇ אלעזר נ̇ע̇.

physDesc.p: Oriental char.; vellum, stained and much injured.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (Recto) סליחה, א̇ב̇, beg. אֿנשי אמונים אבד[וי] אמונים נ[סו] והתפרדו. ... בֿאים בכוח מעשיהם. בטלו בעון דוריהם; an amplification of אנשי אמונה, Zunz, p. 23;
verso, fragment of a כתובה. The man's name is ר̇ יוסף כהן בר כלוף.

physDesc.p: Oriental char.; vellum, injured and stained.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a כתובה
msItem.note: dated Tuesday, 1..4 Sel. [at Fostat].
The man’s name is יוסף בר ישועה בר עלון. Signed, נתנאל בן יוסף and כתיל בן כלף הכהן ש̇צ̇. On the verso are scribbled the names אברהם, יעקב, חיסן בת שלמה ס̇ב̇.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a כתובה
msItem.note: dated Elul, 14.. Sel. = 11.. A.D.
The names מר̇ור̇ יפת and אבו סהל הכהן occur. Verso blank.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Business letter
msItem.note: in Arabic, beg. missing. At the end (verso) some scribbling in Arabic character.

physDesc.p: Oriental char.; vellum, injured and stained.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Accounts
msItem.note: in Arabic, headed שרח חסאב אלשיך אבי אלפרג יוסף בן יעקוב בן עוכל (cf. no. 9). Verso, three lines only.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Letter, in Arabic
msItem.note: from יוסף בן יעקב to אבו אלפצ̇ל [...]אלה בן יעקוב. Verso, address only, written twice.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a כתובה
msItem.note: The man's name is תקוה הלוי בן [שלמה הלוי נ̇ע̇]. Verso scribbling.

physDesc.p: Oriental char.; vellum, defaced by scribbling, and stained.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a conveyance, in Arabic
msItem.note: by [מנצור ?] ולד אלשיך בו סעד אלצירפי ... ידיע בן עُמיר נ̇ע̇ to אלשיך בו אלפרג אלכהן ... בן כ̇ג̇ק̇ מר̇ור̇ משה הכהן ... ידיע בן מרדוך נ̇ע̇, dated (month blank) 1467 Sel. = 1156 A.D., at [Fostat], by authority of Samuel the Nagid. Verso blank.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a כתובה; fragment of Midrash; part of an amulet

msItem.p: Recto, fragment of a כתובה with the signature שלמה בר יוסף נ̇ע̇.
part of an amulet (?) in squ. char. with vowel points.

msItem.note: See also no. 23.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a כתובה; fragment of Midrash; part of an amulet

msItem.p: Recto, fragment belonging to no. 22, obliterated. Signed, של[מה] ברבי אליה הדיין ס̇ט̇.
Verso, parts of the same as in no. 22, verso.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a כתובה
msItem.note: dated ..31 Sel., at Fostat. The man was the son of מר̇ור̇ תקוה הזקן נ̇ע̇. Verso blank.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: Recto, end of a document, dated [14]38 Sel. = 1127 A.D., at Fostat.
Witnesses, אברהם בר̇ שמעיה החבר נ̇ב̇ת̇ו̇י̇א̇ נין שמעיהו גאון נ̇ע̇ (cf. No. 2875, 4, c), חלפון הלוי ביר̇ מנשה נ̇ע̇, משולם ביר̇ מנשה החבר ס̇ט̇, חלפון ביר גאלב [החזן נ̇ע̇], נתן ביר̇ יפת נ̇ע̇.
Below, the confirmation of the same, signed, יצחק ביר̇ שמואל הספרדי זכ̇ לח̇ הע̇ הב̇, זכאי ביר̇ משה ה̇כ̇מ̇, מנשה הכהן החבר ביר̇ ש....
Verso, Ps. lxxxix. 30-53, with vowel points; at the end כמלת.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a כתובה
msItem.note: dated Friday, 47.. A.M. (i.e. between 940 and 1040 A.D.); the equation with the date after the destruction of the temple is missing. The man is מבשר בר יצחק ס̇ט̇.
Verso, four lines of good wishes to the couple.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Letter; legal document
msItem.note: Letter to יצחק ויהושע האחים ... בני ר̇ ומ̇ כלפה ז̇צ̇ל̇ ... from אברהם הפרנס בר̇ מנחם נ̇ב̇ע̇ קרובכם;
only the complimentary beginning is left, carefully written in squ. char., with vowel points.
Verso, part of a legal document called שטר פצוי.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a כתובה
msItem.note: drawn up at Fostat. The woman is סת אלאהל בת מר̇ור̇ נאשי (?) הכהן נ̇ע̇.
Verso blank.

physDesc.p: Oriental char.; vellum, stained and obliterated.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a כתובה; notes
msItem.note: The woman is בת יצחק. Signed, שלמה כהן בר יהודה נ̇ע̇ and חלפון הלוי בר שלמה נ̇נ̇.
Verso, rough notes of accounts in Arabic character.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a כתובה
msItem.note: dated Monday the 10th of Nisan, 4716 A.M. = 956 A.D., at Damascus. The man is ישראל בר יצחק ס̇ט̇.
Verso, scribbling.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a conveyance
msItem.note: dated Elul, 14.. Sel. = 11.. A.D., from מר̇ צדקה הכהן בר מר̇ דויד חכהן נ̇ע̇ to יוסף [? בן יצחק בן אלדאני אלפאסי נ̇ע̇]. Verso blank.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a letter, in Arabic
msItem.note: to [? אבו] יעקוב יוסף בן ... אלפאסי from יצחק (?). Verso, address only.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a כתובה
msItem.note: No date or name remaining. Verso blank.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a כתובה
msItem.note: dated the 20th of Kislew, 1550 Sel. = 1239 A.D., at Fostat, by authority of the Nagid.
The man is מר̇ור̇ יוסף הזקן בן מר̇ור̇ יעקב הזקן .... Verso blank, except for the name משה.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a conveyance
msItem.note: Fragment of a conveyance from [... בן] מר̇ור̇ מُנّג̇א אלעטאר נ̇ע̇ and his daughter, to אלשיך אבו אלפצ̇ל אלרפّא מר̇ור̇ מנשה. Verso blank.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Letter, in Arabic
msItem.note: to יחיי בן מוסי. Obliterated.
Verso, in another hand, business notes in Arabic. Stained.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a letter to the Nagid
msItem.note: dated 1595 Sel. = 1284 A.D. Verso blank.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Letter, in Arabic
msItem.note: from הרון אבן סלימאן כהן בלגת.. to אבו עלי ... אבן צדקה אבן שעי[ב]. Verso, address only.

physDesc.p: Oriental char.; vellum, obliterated and injured.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: גט
msItem.note: dated Thursday the 2nd of Adar ii, 1437 Sel. = 1126 A.D., at Fostat, by which אברהם בר שמריה divorces אסתר בת נמר.
Signed, יצחק ביר̇ שמואל הספרדי זכ̇ לח̇ הע̇ הב̇ and חלפון הלוי ביר̇ מנשה נ̇ע̇.
Verso, certificate that it has been received by the divorced, signed, חלפון (as before) and יצחק המלמד ביר̇ חיים נ̇ע̇ י̇ו̇ב̇א̇.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Liturgical
msItem.note: Recto, beginning of a קינה, with an Arabic introduction beg. ממא קאלה על השר הגדול חסד בן ישר ̇ננ̇. The poem beg. כתב בא מפאת צען בשם איש, with vowel points.
Verso, the following only [פיו]ט על שני האחים נוחם בגן עדן אברהם המכונה אבו סעד ואחיו חסד המכונה אבו נצר אולאד סהל אלתסתרי נ̇נ̇.

physDesc.p: Oriental char.; vellum, injured and stained.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: גט
msItem.note: dated Monday the 10th of Iyyar, 1454 Sel. = 1143 A. D., בעיר אלמחלה הגדולה דעל נילוס נהרא זוטא מותבה, by which אבו נצר בר דינר divorces סתות בת אבו אלחסן.
Signed, זכאי ביר̇ משה נ̇ע̇ and תמים בר יוסף הלוי נ̇נ̇.
Verso, certificate of receipt with the same signatures.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Poem
msItem.note: headed וקאל ממתדחאً ללשיך אבי אסחק אברהים קעטא אטאל אללה בקאה, beg. ארך גלותי בעניי ודלותי.

physDesc.p: Oriental char.; vellum, injured and stained.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Deed, in Arabic
msItem.note: dated Nisan, 1456 Sel. = 1145 A.D., at Fostat, by authority of Samuel the Nagid, certifying that אלשיך אבו אלמעאני came before the ב̇ד̇ and paid to אלשיך אבו אל פצ̇ל 20 dinars in gold, in satisfaction of all claims.
Witnesses, נתן הכן בר נתן הכהן נ̇ע̇ and חיא הכהן בר̇ שלמה ז̇ל̇. The beginning is written twice.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a deed
msItem.note: dated 1529 Sel. = 1218 A.D., at Fostat, by authority of Abraham the Nagid, certifying that ... כ̇ג̇ק̇ מר̇ור̇ יוסף בר ... נ̇ע̇ came before the ב̇ד̇ and paid his debt of 150 dinars, Egyptian currency, to אלשיך אבו אלפצל ... בר ... יוסף ... הכהן. Verso blank.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

taxonomy.desc: General index of Catalogue of the Hebrew Manuscripts in the Bodleian Library, vol. ii, by Adolf Neubauer and Arthur Ernest Cowley, Oxford 1906

term.ref: Abu 'l-faraj Joseph b. Jacob b. ʿAwkal.
Joseph b. Jacob, of Tripolis. Letter.
ʿAyyal dtr of Shelah b. Abraham.
Abu 'l-faraj Joseph b. Jacob b. ʿAwkal.
Abu 'l-faraj Joseph b. Jacob b. ʿAwkal.
Abu ʿImran Musa b. Yaḥya, אלמגאני.
Abu 'l-faraj Joseph b. Jacob b. ʿAwkal. Accounts.
Abu 'l-faraj (kohen) b. (?) Moses, called Ben Marduk.
Manṣur b. Abi Saʿd, called Ben ʿUmair.
Abraham b. Shemaiah, descended from Shemaiah Gaon.
Joseph b. (?) Isaac b. al-Dani, of Fez.
Abu ʿAli b. Ẓedaqah b. Shuʿaib.
Abraham (called Abu Saʿd) b. Sahl, אלתסתרי.
Ḥesed (called Abu Naṣr) b. Sahl, אלתסתרי.
Abraham han-Nagid b. David b. Abraham.
